settings.vendor_description: Modern, durable, and oh-so-comfy, Bundle invites everyone to take a seat.
settings.content: Bundle creates spaces that bring people together with fresh, flexible seating options designed for comfort and conversation. We use durable fabrics, supportive foams, and solid hardwoods that can hold up to the wear and tear of modern life–and look great doing it. And with customizable options, customers can create a seating solution that seamlessly fits their space and their style.

settings.gift_wrap_text: Do you want a gift wrap?

settings.text: Resident is shipped directly to your doorstep. Feel confident in your choice with our warranty. If you are not compleltely satisfied, you can send it back for a full refund, guaranteed.

settings.title_1: Flat-packed sofa for fast delivery. No tools required for easy assembly.
settings.text_2:
• Stain repellency and soil release make cleaning easy
  • Soft and beautiful fabrics
  • No harsh chemicals used
  • Releases both oil- and water-based stains
  • Resists the growth of odor-causing microbes
  • Easy care, requires no harsh cleaners

settings.title_1: Sleep Easy with â¨our 60 Night Trial
settings.text_1: Wash it. Sleep on it. Wash it again. Don't love it? Return it. We donate all returns to charity.
settings.text_reviews:
"By far my favorite thing so far is that they just get softer and softer after every wash! Itâs like magic!"

â Junior R., NY
settings.title_2: Making the Bed is a Breeze
settings.text_2: Little details make a big difference - our sheet sets make it easy to get that polished look with little effort. Special envelope closure on our pillowcases keeps your pillows tucked away and secure. And thanks to a "foot of the bed" label on fitted and flat sheets, you never have to wonder which way is which.
settings.text_3: Made from 100% long-staple cotton fiber, our Essential Cotton sheets are stronger, softer and more durable.

settings.title: How long will it take to get my order?
